title: I am a 15 year old writing a novel. It is one of my best works and it's nearly done. What is some advice on publishing it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well you might need to get a literary agent to represent you. This is sort of the only way to get a publisher to accept your manuscript. Most don't accept unsolicited proposals or manuscripts. Instead the let agents filter the market.  You can get 2015 literary guide of amazon easy enough. Also get some reviews on your work, from a friend, or an English teacher. Or even a profesional editor.  Also follow some publishers blogs, you can get a lot of info from there.I recommend: Chip MacGregor - Books That Make a Difference Also, don't do it for the money.
